ComicInfo.Penciller: Terry Beatty,Ellis Goodson,Gary Kato,Terry Beatty,Ellis Goodson,Gary Kato
ComicInfo.Summary:
Michael meets Ann Tree, her ex-husband's first wife. Ann wants Michael to take care of Mike Jr. should something happen to her. Ann is killed by a car.
Michael hides Mike Jr at Effie's. She thinks Ann's death was suicide. Mike's grandparents come for him. Dominic Muerta sends a message.
